channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Ex-prosecutor’s trial ends as judge throws out her felony indictment in Ahmaud Arbery death case
item.description: A judge has thrown out a felony indictment against a former Georgia prosecutor, ending her trial on charges that she abused her power to protect the men who chased and killed Ahmaud Arbery in 2020.

item.title: USAID is going away, and along with it cocaine-fighting efforts and Amazon rainforest protection
California’s insurance crisis leaves neighbors facing unequal recovery after wildfires
